channel.title: Comments on: Where’s the Ignore Option Apple?

item.title: By: Daniel
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description:
I think Microsoft, Google, Adobe(?) do the very same thing. Yet, nobody complains? Anyway, I think you're absolutely right that something like that requires opt-in.
I don't have a Windows computer here right now, but I think I read that option is somewhere in the menubar of the auto updater.
